comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Probably at Peekskill, NY NYT of Feb 21, 1915 query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9E0DE3DE123FE233A... indicated that exercises would be held that day. Participating was Company F of the 71st Regiment and faculty and students of the New York School of the Line.
